website_summaries.verdict: A good variety of lures for use with freshwater or saltwater fishing. Both the price and quality are decent here.
pros: 151-piece set that includes 6 hard lures, 8 metal lures, 35 soft lures, and a variety of accessories
For use with both fresh and saltwater fishing
cons: The colors here are random, so you may not get exactly what you order
Some buyers say the tackle box is on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected upon opening
customer_reviews.text: Expected this to be bigger, a bit misleading on the stock photo
customer_reviews.author: Chevygrlme

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is actually legit! Caught a bunch of fish using this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is small Boc than how it is shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelie Merana

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my 17 year old son ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 17 year old son. He loves it. Thinking about purchasing one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Mable

customer_reviews.title: Good price, photos are misleading
customer_reviews.text: Everything is there and not a bad price but beware it does not come as shown in pictures and A LOT smaller than in the pictures!! Hooks are very tiny also received 3 of the same exact lure when different ones are shown in pictures
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!!
customer_reviews.text: Idek how to use most of these things yet but i am extremely happy with the product(s).
customer_reviews.author: Edo Brisku

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and came exactly as described.very happy w this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Good and worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great package. I was surprised at the quality inside. Good all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mike mobley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product says it includes frog lures but there were none in the box which is really disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: When you buy this keep in mind the box is smaller than the picture shows BUT it comes with everything you need! We've already gone fishing and they were amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Great set caught many different fish on spinners and jigs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but its was a good product.
customer_reviews.text: So far I never use these fishing lure yet,but its was a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Hawai Octavo

customer_reviews.title: was cheap and got cheap product.. You get ...
customer_reviews.text: was cheap and got cheap product..You get what you pay for... VERY SMALL and Some of the lures don't function properly .
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Threemart 151pcs Fishing Lure Set,Including Frog Lures, Spoon Lures,Soft Plastic Lures, Popper, Crank, Rattlin and More (Style 2)
